# Changes

* Use preact
* Mark preact and dayjs as external dependencies

## 0.1.3

* enable release on codeberg.org

* Added release helper [components#9](https://codeberg.org/bovine/mucked_up_components/issues/9)
* remove dependency on styled-components [components#7](https://codeberg.org/bovine/mucked_up_components/issues/7)
